name: Socky in HECC - VimJam3
description:
VimJam3 Submission and my first finished game.

CONTROLS AND HOW TO PLAY:

you need to keep your thirst bar high and the heat bar down.

also avoid the fireballs!

WASD or ARROW KEYS: move and jump

V: drink water

used labchirp and sfxr

Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io)

  Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

the graphics are all done by me
